snippet.title: 👑 For The King II - Announce Trailer - Wishlist Now!
snippet.description:
Battle against Fahrul's tyrannical Queen alone or as a party of 4 players in For The King II, the sequel to the massively popular turn-based roguelike tabletop RPG!


Wishlist For The King II on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1676840/


For The King II builds on the challenging blend of Strategy, JRPG Combat, and Roguelike elements from the hugely popular and successful co-op sensation, For The King, to create an epic new experience!


Wishlist now and sign up to the For The King Discord to follow the creation of the game and receive exclusive news and updates!


Please note that For The King II is still in development and we’re currently working on new features and changes to deliver the best experience possible!


Join the For The King II community:
💬 For The King Discord: https://discord.gg/FU2kFkP6yA
🐦 For The King Twitter: https://twitter.com/IronOakGames
📜 For The King Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/ForTheKing/


Join the Curve Games community:
🐦 Curve Games Twitter: https://twitter.com/curvegames
🎮 Curve Games Steam Group: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/curvedigital/
📫 Sign up for the official Curve Games newsletter here: https://curvegames.com/sign-up/
